revised_title: Investigating Induced Contractions and Electric Discharges in Muscles
tldr: The author conducts experiments to determine the nature of induced contractions and the role of electric discharges in muscle contractions. They find that induced contractions are exclusive to the muscle in contraction and that the turpentine coating does not affect the electric discharge. The author concludes that further research is needed to understand the relationship between induced contractions and electric discharges.
